about.title: About Me
content: I have been working as a Software Engineer for over 6 years, mastering Go, Python, and DevOps practices.
Throughout my career, I've actively worked with distributed systems, ensuring seamless integrations and performance optimization.
With over 5 years devoted to Go, I've crafted applications that emphasize sophisticated algorithms and data structures.
My toolkit includes big data technologies like AWS Glue, Athena, and Google Cloud Dataflow, complemented by expertise with Apache Beam and Java.

My database expertise spans across various relational and NoSQL platforms, including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, BigTable, and Cloud Spanner, which has been pivotal in solving complex data-centric challenges.
While my backend proficiencies are extensive, I've also engaged in frontend projects with Vue.js, Angular, and TypeScript, ensuring a holistic approach to software development.

My familiarity with Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud platforms, especially AWS and GCP, synergizes well with my DevOps experience, all underscored by a proactive attitude and consistent communication excellence.

roles.title: Senior Go Developer
roles.description: Worked on an IT monitoring tool that provides enterprises with deep visibility into their entire IT infrastructures. The platform is built on a distributed system framework using Go, with GraphQL as the API gateway for a microservices architecture. Responsibilities included architecture design, code development, team leadership, and ensuring code security and quality.
roles.technologies: Go, Python, Java, JavaScript, Vue.js, Kubernetes, GCP, GKE, Dataflow, GraphQL, Protocol Buffers, gRPC, MongoDB, Etcd, Spinnaker, Jenkins, ElasticSearch, Ginkgo

roles.title: Backend Go Developer
roles.description: Developed an advanced Transportation Management System built on microservices architecture that seamlessly integrates with monolithic systems and interfaces with machine learning systems. Utilized event-driven approaches for real-time responsiveness and asynchronous communication patterns. Led performance optimization efforts and worked with Superset for data visualization and Airflow for workflow orchestration.
roles.technologies: Go, Python, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, Etcd, TypeScript, Angular, Docker, CircleCI, AWS, GCP, GKE, Cypress, Superset, LogRocket, Airflow, DataDog, Docker Compose

roles.title: Go Developer
roles.description: Developed a healthcare patient relationship management platform with tools to enhance patient experience. The system's containers were orchestrated by Kubernetes, with Docker ensuring consistent environments. Communication between microservices was facilitated via Pub/Sub, while external interfaces communicated through RESTful APIs and internal service-to-service interactions utilized gRPC.
roles.technologies: Go, GCP, GKE, JavaScript, Vue.js, Mithril, PubSub, Dataflow, PostgreSQL, CockroachDB, Echo, Microservices, REST, gRPC, GCP BigTable, Cloud Spanner, GitLab

roles.title: DevOps Cloud Engineer
roles.description: Led migration of existing services to cloud environments, prioritizing seamless integration of distinct projects and custom architectural designs. Implemented comprehensive reporting systems for cloud cost management and optimization. Provided specialized AWS consultations, management, and guidance.
roles.technologies: AWS, S3, Elastic Beanstalk, Cognito, Glue, Athena, Lambda, CloudWatch Events, CloudFormation, Go, Python, Celery, Kafka, New Relic, Zendesk, AWS ECR, Vue.js, JavaScript, Terraform, Jenkins, AWS CodeBuild, AWS CodePipeline

roles.title: Software Web Developer
roles.description: Developed a customer service automation platform for domain registration and web hosting services. The platform employed chatbots, integrated IBM Watson for chat automation, used containerized applications for efficient service delivery, and leveraged NLP and data analysis to refine customer interactions.
roles.technologies: Go, Python, Docker, Docker Compose, IBM Bluemix Cloud, Watson AI, Rasa, Beautiful Soup, Scrapy, Pandas, MongoDB, Gorilla Mux
